VACANCY: MECHANICAL FITTER

Ref: CXP103/2024

To undertake and be responsible for the mechanical maintenance on company sites.
Salary: Market related– dependent on experience and quals
Fixed term contract with potential for permanency
Location: Durban Bayhead

Criteria:
Grade 12 with relevant qualification
Certified Artisan Mechanical Fitter
5 years proven experience as a qualified mechanical fitter in large industries. (Petro Chemical, paper, pulp or large manufacturing).
Medically fit to work on industrial sites.
Prepared to work shifts, standby, callouts, and overtime
Ability to work at heights and in confined spaces.
Computer literate
